reviewText: This was a spin off from "Waking the Dead", about a cold case unit. The lead here was the pathologist in that series. However, she was not a strong character in that show. I was rather surprised to see her step into the lead in this series as she seems far more capable of supporting actor work. I did not appreciate, until seeing this spin off, how important it is to have a strong, almost overwhelming actor in the lead. Trevor Eve was that lead in "Waking the Dead". He played one of the most obnoxious people imaginable. Yet he was very effective as the leader of the unit. With his not being in the spin-off, it was as if the air had gone out of the show, like a balloon.  Trevor Eve juiced up the show and made it compelling. Sometimes you wanted to throw the set at him but you never wanted to turn it off. This spin-off never had anyone like that in it. So I learned something: nice characters without that strong personality have a hard, almost impossible time, getting series tv off the ground. I fully expected it to last only one season and that is all it did.
I found it rather boring unfortunately.
Not the greatest forensic shows, disappointing, that's why there is only one season.  Too bad.
So wish they had continued with the series!

Waking the Dead was spot on...this was too gory to watch!  Forget disc 1, go to 2 and 3 and forget 4!

Too explicit to watch!!!  Don't waste your money on this one!

I couldn't be happier with the fast shipping and receipt of my DVD.  I have had items from just across the border in the US take 10 times faster to arrive than this did all the way from UK.  Thanks so much.  Loved this show and will enjoy having it on hand to watch again.  Packaged securely, item in A1 shape when it arrived.  Thanks so much again !
Interesting methods of solving impossible crimes.
Entertaining
I like Fitzgerald a lot, but this series seems a little trite and the characters a bit overdrawn, especially the Aspergers-type guy. Maybe Ive just seem one too many seasons of Bones?
A great intelligent show. If you like the dark murder mystery with scientists and cops struggling to understand each other and solve murders you will love this!
Disgusting
enjoyable if you like this genre

Disappointing.  The crew lacks the interest of the Waking the Dead crew, the heavy bracketing narration has little relevance to the stories, the fact the crew works on active cases alongside a detective is implausible, and most of all, they almost never use the bodies in the body farm to help their cases, thus, the body farm setting is irrelevant.  It is watchable, but again, disappointing.
Depressing and not really that good in my opinion.
Interesting, different, compelling
Really enjoyed the show. It's unusual and portrays a different point of view to CSI work.  I found each show an interesting reflection on humanity and how situations and evidence can evolve.

I couldn't make it through 2 episodes. It is an attempt to copy the better CSI top shows, but it's SO poorly done. It is totally contrived, in that they find some scientific fact, and then try to build a story around it. I can't recall ever being so disappointed in a show. I love UK cop shows, but this falls flat on its face. Don't waste your time, or money.
I liked this show.  Good stories and good characters.
The BBC at its best. Drama and dry humour, compelling viewing
Great show.

I loved this series!!!! It was edgy and if I'd seen it when it first premiered, I would've said it was a one-of-a-kind series. Of course now we have all of the CSI's and all those other forensic evidence examination shows. Still I liked this show because the characters seemed like something that has not been presented in American TV thus far. Great meld of characters that gels well within the storyline. I liked this show, but watch it for yourself.

Well written and produced. Intriguing characters and well cast. Pity it only lasted one season.
Some people complained about the Gore, but decay is a natural process and nature isn't always pretty. It's reality. The science of forensics help the dead to speak, especially those who were the victims of murder and their families, and hopefully find justice. Cracking good show!
Well done
Great product, accurate & clear product description, fast & excellent service & communication
Great show.  Would love to see more .
wish also that this show was still on the air  loved it
Not sophisticated enough.  Rather boring plots.
Love this series and wish they had continued it.
Will watch again.
ok
To gorry
Really enjoyed. Hope for more.

Very realistic and involved in how crimes are often figured out through research done at body farms. Definitely different from the usual crime show and I'll watch more of the series. Had a technical view and yet kept personal interaction of team members too.
I love forensics shows....but not this one.
This was fascinating.
I just couldn't get into it.  I don't know why.  It didn't hold my attention.
